ai-patthana21.51:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.51:0.3_0: covering the Shady Orchid Tree, etc., which are attached to and so on,
ai-patthana21.51:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion, views, doubt, conceit, desire to be reborn, and ignorance.
ai-patthana21.51:1.1_2: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.51:1.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.51:2.1_0: Not for the sake of fact, not for the sake of non-existence, and for the sake of function, not for the sake of passions.
ai-patthana21.51:2.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.51:4.1_0: Not long is only for the flood, not for the resentment, and for the sake of flood.
ai-patthana21.51:4.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.51:6.1_0: One who doesn’t give rise to repulsion for being a cause of attachment, for the sake of repulsion, not for those who don’t have a reason.
ai-patthana21.51:6.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.51:8.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to the hindrances, while the teaching doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana21.51:8.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.51:10.1_0: We don’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana21.51:10.1_1: This is the section in brief.
